rule.name: badAriaRole
rule.title: Bad Aria Role
rule.description: Elements with ARIA roles must use a valid, non-abstract ARIA role

rule.name: controlsWithoutLabel
rule.title: Controls Without Label
rule.description: Controls and media elements should have labels

rule.name: badAriaAttribute
rule.title: Bad Aria Attribute
rule.description: This element has an invalid ARIA attribute

rule.name: focusableElementNotVisibleAndNotAriaHidden
rule.title: Focusable Element Not Visible And Not Aria Hidden
rule.description: These elements are focusable but either invisible or obscured by another element

rule.name: imagesWithoutAltText
rule.title: Images Without Alt Text
rule.description: Images should have a text alternative or presentational role

rule.name: linkWithUnclearPurpose
rule.title: Link With Unclear Purpose
rule.description: The purpose of each link should be clear from the link text

rule.name: lowContrastElements
rule.title: Low Contrast Elements
rule.description: Text elements should have a reasonable contrast ratio

rule.name: elementsWithMeaningfulBackgroundImage
rule.title: Elements With Meaningful Background Image
rule.description: Meaningful images should not be used in element backgrounds

rule.name: ariaRoleNotScoped
rule.title: Aria Role Not Scoped
rule.description: Elements with ARIA roles must be in the correct scope

rule.name: requiredAriaAttributeMissing
rule.title: Required Aria Attribute Missing
rule.description: Elements with ARIA roles must have all required attributes for that role

rule.name: ariaOnReservedElement
rule.title: Aria On Reserved Element
rule.description: This element does not support ARIA roles, states and properties

rule.name: humanLangMissing
rule.title: Human Lang Missing
rule.description: The web page should have the content's human language indicated in the markup

rule.name: mainRoleOnInappropriateElement
rule.title: Main Role On Inappropriate Element
rule.description: role=main should only appear on significant elements

rule.name: tabIndexGreaterThanZero
rule.title: Tab Index Greater Than Zero
rule.description: Avoid positive integer values for tabIndex
